snippet.title: ASTROBOTANICA - Official Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
🌱 ASTROBOTANICA - Kickstarter Pre-Launch Page is LIVE!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/spacegoblinstudio/astrobotanica

Official Teaser - Game Reveal
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2720920/ASTROBOTANICA/

ASTROBOTANICA is a cozy survival set on open-world prehistoric Earth.

Discover Earth 300 thousand years ago as an alien biologist. Utilize your expertise in botany to survive, grow plants, harvest crops, compose and brew tonics. Reveal hidden powers of unknown plants. Engage with primal humans, leaving your mark on the future of civilization.

more info: 
https://www.astrobotanicagame.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/astrobotanicagame/
X: https://x.com/AstrobotanGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61564187010523
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/astrobotanica/
Discord: https://discord.gg/mbCZEa65vW
